Performance improvements and small surprises!

Happy Holidays!

- MoneyLion
Performance improvements and bug-fixes.
Bug fixes & performance improvements,

Bugs: We fixed them
Performance: We improved it

- Various performance improvements and updates under the hood
- Bugfixes across the board

Thanks for using MoneyLion!
Fixed an issue preventing some of our users from staying logged in. Sorry for the inconvenience!

Thanks for using MoneyLion! This update has even more ways to maximize your money.

• Build your savings and credit more easily with MoneyLion Plus enhancements
• Play new daily trivia to test your financial smarts. Game on!
• Get more insights into your investment portfolio and allocation
• Refer your friends to earn cash and rewards

Some performance improvements and UI tweaks for smaller screens. Thanks for using MoneyLion!
Plenty of bug fixes and improvements for slower internet connections.
We've made card activation simpler so you can get started faster!
Plenty of bug fixes and UX improvements. Thanks for using MoneyLion!
Fixed an issue preventing some of our users from staying logged in. Sorry for the inconvenience!
Lots of bugfixes and ways to make your experience more enjoyable. Thanks for using MoneyLion!
Lots of bugfixes and ways to make your experience more enjoyable. Thanks for using MoneyLion!

Introducing the Financial Heartbeat℠ — a fitness tracker for your money! Now you can monitor your financial health the same way you use a fitness tracker to measure your physical health. View your money stats, level up your scores, earn rewards, and more — all in this amazingly beautiful new feature! Check it out by swiping through your cards.
A new lending marketplace, bug fixes, and performance improvements. Thanks for using MoneyLion!
More lending offers, some cool re-skins, bug fixes, and performance improvements. Thanks for using MoneyLion!
Various improvements and interaction fixes. Thanks for using MoneyLion!
We made it easier than ever to add direct deposit and unlock 0% APR cash advances up to $250. Thanks for using MoneyLion!
We made it easier than ever to add direct deposit and unlock 0% APR cash advances up to $250. Thanks for using MoneyLion!

- Improvements to the Instacash experience
- New, easier, lower-cost way to get 5.99% APR loans for all new Plus members

Thanks for using MoneyLion!
This one’s a goodie! Now 0% APR Instacash advances are easier to access than ever. Like, you can get cash TODAY. For whatever you need. Aw, yeah! Update your app and enjoy.
Now you can easily update your debit card for Instacash! And, lots of bug fixes and improvements as well, update to enjoy!
Greetings, MoneyLion Pride! Just a fun little update this time for your 0% APR Instacash experience, because confetti makes cash even better. Enjoy!

Great news! With our latest update, now you can easily add a checking account to your digital Wallet in the app, making it easier than ever to manage your payments. We made some other fresh fixes and improvements too. Download or update the app now to get started.
Seasons Greetings! Our busy elves have made the app even easier to use, so you can know your loan and 0% APR Instacash options and get what you need faster.

This update keeps the app roaring with performance improvements and fixes and includes a change to our Credit Builder Plus loan. You'll now receive a specific low interest rate offer when you apply for the loan, and members must download this update before they can request a new loan. Cheers to borrowing and building credit in 2020!

This latest update brings you credit builder loans up to $1,000 -- double what was offered before! More cash for today while you build credit for tomorrow. Yahoo! We also made it easy breezy to update your payment methods (such as for your loan) right in the app. Enjoy!

Now get up to $150 in zero-interest cash advances just by linking any checking account where you get direct deposits, as a member of Instacash with Banking or Credit Builder Plus. What else? We did our usual thorough review and polish to ensure a smooth, premium digital banking experience!

In honor of Valentine's Day, we've given the app some extra lovin' with cuddle-bug fixes and performance improvements. Thanks for using the MoneyLion app for your financial needs. Download the latest version and feel the love today!

This update was all about speed! We made a few tweaks so you can get interest-free cash even faster after you sign up for an Instacash with Banking membership. Plus, we made it easier to link external accounts when you want to transfer money.

With our latest improvements, the app works even better to help you borrow, save, and invest! You can now see any overdue payments in process as you repay your interest-free Instacash cash advances. And you can use your current billing address to add cards to your MoneyLion digital Wallet more easily. We're all about helping you track and manage your $$ with ease.
Staying home? Us too. We squashed a few bugs (while wearing our favorite sweatpants) to keep the app primed to support you with interest-free advances, real-time access to your money, and more.

Our latest update aims to make life a little easier. You can use the new chatbot to get help, such as to defer payments, and change your address right in the app. We also made updates to the Rewards tab - you deserve it!

Goodbye fee, hello free! Now get 0% APR cash advances up to $250 with NO monthly fee. That's no interest, no credit check, and no monthly fee. Just cash when you need it. Update your app and tap Instacash on the home screen to apply and get cash today.

What's new: We made some performance fixes to keep our 6 million members happy with interest-free cash advances, credit builder loans, investing, and more. Update your app and visit our one-stop shop for financial health today!

We skipped the bread making challenge and cooked up some delicious updates instead! We're starting to roll out our new RoarMoney account, with banking perks like early direct deposit of any eligible check and contactless pay! We also made it easier to qualify for Instacash advances if you're on employment. Bon appetit!
We did a little spring cleaning in the app to sweep out a few bugs and polish up some performance. To experience the freshness and perks like 0% APR Instacash, update your app now!

Now you can fund your RoarMoney account almost instantly with a debit card. Discover this and other RoarMoney conveniences like early paydays and higher cash advances in the app. Make your money move!
We made a few updates that make it even easier to manage your money. You'll find more ways to fund your RoarMoney account, including interest-free cash advances.

Summer is flying by, and we know it's a challenging time for many. So we made updates that help you borrow, save, and care for your financial health more easily. Think of the app like protection for your finances.

We've upgraded our rewards program so you can earn points at top online brands and redeem them for cash deposits in your investment account! We've removed the old in-store offers and gift card redemptions. Visit the Rewards tab to start earning.

Now you have two ways to add bank accounts to your MoneyLion Wallet! You can enter your account and routing numbers manually, or you can enter your account's login credentials (username & password). A few bugs were squashed too. Ew, bugs.
A few bug fixes and performance updates to keep the app purring like a kitten with easy access to mobile banking, interest-free advances, loans, managed investing, and more.

This version makes it easier to connect your bank accounts to the app, so you can unlock financial tracking tools, interest-free cash advances, and more faster! We also bashed bugs and boosted performance. Thanks for choosing MoneyLion!

Our credit builder loan got some upgrades! First, you can now set up automatic repayments during your loan application (no credit check, btw). This should make on-time payments, which are a big credit score booster, much easier. And we improved the loan funding experience! Your credit builder loan funding comes in two parts (some money you get right away, and some you get after you pay off your loan). Now you'll be able to see the status of the second part of your funding in realtime, so you can know when it's on its way to you after you pay off your loan!

Not much. What's new with you? ... Just thought we'd try a little twist our usual notes this time! But seriously, we've made some important bug fixes and performance improvements in this release. Update your app to enjoy!
We added a few improvements and bug fixes in this release, update your app to enjoy!
What's on your holiday wish list this year? If it's improved app performance and financial tools, update your app to get your wish.
Now if you have a scheduled loan payment, you'll be able to pay it upfront in the app (or let it happen on auto like usual). We like to be flexible and helpful, y'all. Update your app and enjoy!

Great news everybody! We’re inviting more people to join us - on the event that we are unable to detect your account info, you can still qualify for Credit Builder Plus by entering your bank account manually. Update your app to get started!

Season’s Greetings!

We’ve made some important bug fixes and performance improvements in this release - just in time for the holidays!

We’d also like to take this opportunity to wish you a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!
We're excited to kickstart a new decade with y'all, here's an update that gives you an even better experience to access instant cash, credit builder loans, early paychecks and much more. Update now!
We're excited to kickstart a new decade with y'all, here's an update that gives you an even better experience to access instant cash, credit builder loans, early paychecks and much more. Update now!

Hi there! How are those New Year’s resolutions coming along?

For this release, you’ll notice some slight changes in UI, just to enhance your experience with us.

And just like that, January 2021 is past us. 11 more months for you to make the best of the year!

Our latest update gives you more detailed information about your credit reserve account - when the funds will be released, the amount of funds, and now, what bank account it will be released to.

What do you need to do? Just update!

We hope you had a good Valentine’s weekend! Always a great time to bond and intentionally show affection to your loved one(s).

Speaking of loved ones, we’re showing a bit of love to y’all as well - when you’re happy, we’re happy! Our latest update now displays past and expected completion dates for the escrow completion process.

Just update to get this functionality!

And just like that, we’ve marched our way to March. Time flies, eh?

Our latest update features some touch-ups in the user interface, making sure you have a better user experience when using our app! You’ll notice some items renamed, some messages rephrased, and some bugs squashed.
This patch release addresses a critical issue affecting some users.
This patch update contains an improvement that brings you a better cross-platform experience!

Hello again! Time for another app update!

This latest release has us squash some bugs, deal with crashes, and spruce up some parts of our interface.

Just update the app to get the best MoneyLion experience!

Greetings and salutations!

Credit Builder Plus users, we hear you! Our latest update now displays your actual account used for ACH disbursements. As for users who make full repayments ahead of schedule (good on you!), you will now be informed where the funds in your escrow account will go to.

All you need to do is just tap that "Update" button, and you're good to go!

Good day! Stay awhile and listen (or read, really)!

This release features updated designs for our various screens, which we believe will bring about an improved user experience for users, both existing and new.

Meanwhile, users with an Investment account can now choose how to fund their accounts, whether it be through their RoarMoney accounts or external bank accounts. Aside from that, users with Credit Builder Plus loans will now see more details around disbursement and repayment information.

Just tap that "Update" button to get all these new features!

Good news everybody! A new update just dropped.

What's new, you ask? Well, MoneyLion works best with MoneyLion products, so in this update, we're guiding active Credit Builder Plus users to fully maximize and utilize their membership benefits!

What are you waiting for? Don't hesitate, Update!

Hi there! It's time for another app update!

This release mainly features fixes to our UI and messaging - you will now be notified and have greater visibility of your status on our various flows.

All you need to do to just tap that "Update" button!

And just like that, we're now in the sixth month of 2021. How are those 2021 resolutions coming along?

This release is all about helping our Instacash users! You're now able to change your Instacash repayment date to better match your next deposit. Aside from that, we've also updated our Instacash screens for clarity.

Don't need to do much - just tap that "Update" button!
